    The Upshot

    The 550 People, Places and Things Donald
    Trump Has Insulted on Twitter: A Complete List

    By JASMINE C. LEE and KEVIN QUEALY UPDATED December 7, 2018

    Insults since Mr. Trump became president are highlighted in yellow; the most recent updates are shaded purple. (This list covers tweets since Mr. Trump declared his candidacy.)

    ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ
    Week of December 02, 2018
    The Bill, Hillary and Chelsea Clinton Foundation
    Philanthropic organization
    “corrupt”
    Hillary Clinton
    “Crooked Hillary”
    “corrupt”
    Michael Cohen
    Former lawyer for Mr. Trump
    “TERRIBLE”
    “makes up stories to get a GREAT & ALREADY reduced deal for himself”
    “lied”
    James Comey
    Former F.B.I. director
    “Leakin’ Lyin’ James Comey”
    “Lyin’ James Comey”
    Democrats
    “corrupt”
    The “mainstream” media
    “Fake News Media”
    “FAKE NEWS”
    “THE ENEMY OF THE PEOPLE!”
    “Fake News”
    Members of Robert Mueller’s team
    “out of control band of Angry Democrats, don’t want the truth, they only want lies”
    “The truth is very bad for their mission!”
    “17 Angry Dems”
    “People forced to lie”
    “17 Angry Democrats”
    “lying”
    “leaking”
    Robert Mueller
    Leader of Special Counsel investigation, former F.B.I. director
    “a rogue and out of control prosecutor”
    “a much different man than people think”
    “big time conflicts of interest”
    Paris Climate Accords
    “fatally flawed”
    “whitewashing some of the worst polluters”
    Rod J. Rosenstein
    United States Deputy Attorney General
    “totally conflicted”
    Allegations of collusion between Russia and members of the Trump campaign
    “phony Russia Witch Hunt”
    “Presidential Harassment!”
    “Witch Hunt!”
    “total Witch Hunt”
    “Witch Hunt”
    Rex Tillerson
    U.S. Secretary of State
    “didn’t have the mental capacity needed”
    “dumb as a rock”
    “I couldn’t get rid of him fast enough”
    “lazy as hell”
    Andrew Weissmann
    A lieutenant to Robert Mueller on the special counsel investigation
    “horrible and vicious prosecutorial past”
    “wrongly destroyed people’s lives”
    “took down great companies”
    Week of November 25, 2018
    “60 Minutes”
    CBS News broadcast
    “did a phony story about child separation,”
    “Fake 60 Minutes!”
    Hillary Clinton
    “Crooked Hillary”
    “Crooked”
    CNN
    “doesn’t do great in the United States based on ratings”
    “a powerful voice portraying the United States in an unfair and false way”
    The European Union
    “has taken advantage of us on Trade”
    Groups of would-be immigrants approaching the border
    “stone cold criminals”
    The “mainstream” media
    “Fake Media”
    “Fake News”
    “disgusting Fake News”
    Members of Robert Mueller’s team
    “gang of Angry Dems”
    “only looking at one side, not the other, Wait until it comes out how horribly & viciously they are treating people, ruining lives for them refusing to lie”
    “terrible Gang of Angry Democrats”
    “they’ve got nothing but ruined lives”
    “terrible people”
    “Angry Mueller Gang of Dems”
    “viciously telling witnesses to lie about facts”
    “Angry Democrats, aren’t even looking at the atrocious, and perhaps subversive, crimes that were committed by Crooked Hillary Clinton and the Democrats”
    Robert Mueller
    Leader of Special Counsel investigation, former F.B.I. director
    “will he be covering all of his conflicts of interest in a preamble”
    “a conflicted prosecutor gone rogue....”
    “only looking at one side, not the other”
    “The Fake News Media builds Bob Mueller up as a Saint, when in actuality he is the exact opposite”
    “doing TREMENDOUS damage to our Criminal Justice System”
    “he is only looking at one side and not the other”
    “refuses to look at the real crimes on the other side”
    North American Free Trade Agreement
    “terrible”
    Allegations of collusion between Russia and members of the Trump campaign
    “Phony Witch Hunt”
    “$30,000,000 Witch Hunt”
    “The Mueller Witch Hunt”
    “a total disgrace”
    “discredited Witch Hunt”
    “This total Hoax will be studied for years!”
    “Did you ever see an investigation more in search of a crime?”
    “A total disgrace!”
    “illegal Joseph McCarthy style Witch Hunt”
    “has shattered so many innocent lives”
    “wasting more than $40,000,000 (is that possible?)”
    “So Ridiculous!”
    “A total Witch Hunt!”
    “an illegal Hoax”
    “Witch Hunt!”
    Brenda Snipes
    Former Supervisor of Elections for Broward County, Fla.
    “was just spotted wearing a beautiful dress with 300 I VOTED signs on it”
    The U.S. Justice Department
    “Let these terrible people go back to the Clinton Foundation and “Justice” Department!”
    United States
    “going in the wrong direction (to put it mildly)”
    Week of November 18, 2018
    White House Correspondents' Dinner
    “a dying evening and tradition!”
    Michelle Wolf
    Comedian
    “So-called comedian”
    “bombed so badly last year”
    Bill Clinton
    “famously missed his shot”
    The “mainstream” media
    “Fake News”
    “Fake News”
    “Fake News Media”
    “FAKE NEWS”
    “They never like to ask me for a quote b/c it would kill their story”

    Leader of Special Counsel investigation, former F.B.I. director
    “highly conflicted”

    “It would be great if the 9th Circuit was indeed an “independent judiciary””
    “making our country unsafe!”

    “people who know nothing about security and the safety of our citizens”

    United States congressman
    “little Adam Schitt”
    Week of November 11, 2018
    Facebook
    “biased”
    “in favor of the Democrats”

    “biased”
    “in favor of the Democrats”
    The “mainstream” media
    “Fake News!”
    “FAKE NEWS MEDIA, crazy”
    “always seeking to make us look as bad as possible”
    “Very dishonest!”
    “Fake News”
    “FAKE NEWS”
    “the Enemy of the People!”
    Members of Robert Mueller’s team
    “have gone absolutely nuts, They are screaming and shouting at people, horribly threatening them to come up with the answers they want”
    “a disgrace to our Nation”
    “Angry People, They won’t even look at all of the bad acts and crimes on the other side”
    “gang of Democrat thugs”
    Robert Mueller
    Leader of Special Counsel investigation, former F.B.I. director
    “highly conflicted”
    “highly conflicted (and NOT Senate approved)”
    “Why is he protecting Crooked Hillary, Comey, McCabe, Lisa Page & her lover, Peter S, and all of his friends on the other side?”
    The New York Times
    “inaccurate”
    “Fake News”
    “did a phony story, as usual”
    Allegations of collusion between Russia and members of the Trump campaign
    “a total mess”

    “biased”

    Congressional candidate

    “Fake News”
    “Nasty”

    “FAKE NEWS!”

    United States senator
